title: Token factory
description: Create and deploy tokenized assets on the blockchain—it's like having your own digital mint

bond.name: Bond factory
bond.description: Issue digital bonds with programmable interest payments and maturity dates

deposit.name: Deposit factory
deposit.description: Launch secure, time-locked deposit certificates on the blockchain

equity.name: Equity factory
equity.description: Transform company shares into compliant digital ownership tokens

fund.name: Fund factory
fund.description: Build tokenized investment funds that investors can easily join and exit

stablecoin.name: Stablecoin factory
stablecoin.description: Deploy your own price-stable digital currency backed by real assets

name.label: Token name
name.helper: Pick something clear and memorable—this is what users will see

symbol.label: Token symbol
symbol.helper: Your token's ticker—keep it short and distinctive (3-5 letters)

decimals.label: Decimal places
decimals.helper: How small can pieces be? 18 lets you divide tokens into tiny fractions

initialSupply.label: Initial supply
initialSupply.helper: The starting amount—you can always mint more later if enabled

maxSupply.label: Maximum supply
maxSupply.helper: Set a hard cap to control scarcity (leave empty for unlimited)

mintable.label: Allow minting
mintable.helper: Need flexibility? Enable this to create new tokens after launch

burnable.label: Allow burning
burnable.helper: Let token holders destroy their tokens—useful for buybacks or redemptions

pausable.label: Emergency pause
pausable.helper: Add a safety switch to freeze all transfers if something goes wrong

transferRestrictions.label: Transfer controls
transferRestrictions.helper: Set rules about who can trade—essential for regulated securities

empty.title: No factories yet
empty.description: Ready to tokenize your first asset? Let's set up a factory and get started!

messages.deploySuccess: Perfect! Your factory is up and running
messages.deployError: We hit a snag deploying your factory
messages.createSuccess: Excellent! Your tokens are now live on the blockchain
messages.createError: Something went wrong creating your tokens
messages.insufficientFunds: You'll need more funds in your wallet for gas fees
messages.factoryCreated: Nice! {{name}} is ready to start minting tokens
messages.factoryCreationFailed: That didn't work as expected. Let's give it another shot
messages.batchCompleted: All done! {{count}} factories are ready to mint
messages.noResultError: The blockchain didn't return a factory address—let's try again
messages.defaultError: Something unexpected happened. Let's try creating your factory again
messages.transactionSubmitted: Transaction sent! The blockchain is processing your request...
messages.factoryCreationCompleted: Success! Your factory deployment is complete
messages.allFactoriesSucceeded: Fantastic! All {{count}} factories are deployed and ready
messages.someFactoriesFailed: Deployed {{success}} factories successfully, but {{failed}} need another try
messages.allFactoriesFailed: None of the {{count}} factories deployed—let's troubleshoot this together
messages.factoryAlreadyExists: {{name}} factory already exists, skipping to the next one...
messages.allFactoriesSkipped: All {{count}} factories are already deployed—you're all set!
messages.someFactoriesSkipped: Created {{success}} new factories, found {{skipped}} existing ones, and {{failed}} had issues

help.whatIsFactory: Token factories are smart contract templates that streamline asset creation—deploy once, mint many times with consistent standards and security
help.deploymentCosts: Each deployment requires gas fees paid in the blockchain's native currency—make sure your wallet has enough funds
help.compliance: Enable compliance features for regulated assets like securities—this ensures only verified users can trade
help.security: Every factory undergoes rigorous security audits and follows industry best practices to protect your assets
